title: Recommended Readings (General)
text: This page contains a list of readings that I would recommend for anyone. It includes articles with topics that range from religion, mental health, classic books and short stories.

title: Recommended Readings (General)
text:
Interesting Articles and Speeches

How Will You Measure Your Life? Clayton Christensen (2010)
A World Split Apart. Alexander Solzhenitsyn (1978)
The Inner Ring. CS Lewis (1944)

title: Recommended Readings (General)
text:
My Favorite Short Stories

How Much Land Does a Man Require? Leo Tolstoy (1886)
The Americanization of Kambili. Tochi Eze (2022)
The Street Sweep. Meron Hadero (2018)

title: Recommended Readings (General)
text:
Classics

Night (Elie Wiesel)
Gilead (Marilynne Robinson)

title: Recommended Readings (General)
section: Mental Health / Counseling / Peace of Mind
text:
Mental Health / Counseling / Peace of Mind

When People Are Big and God Is Small: Overcoming Peer Pressure, Codependency, and the Fear of Man (Edward T. Welch)
Seeing with New Eyes: Counseling and the Human Condition Through the Lens of Scripture (David A. Powlison)
Man’s Search for Meaning (Viktor E. Frankl)
Absence of Mind: The Dispelling of Inwardness from the Modern Myth of the Self (Marilynne Robinson)

title: Recommended Readings (General)
text:
Religious

The Reason for God: Belief in an Age of Skepticism (Timothy J. Keller)
The Cost of Discipleship (Dietrich Bonhoeffer)
A Treatise of Earthly-Mindedness (Jeremiah Burroughs)
The Knowledge of the Holy (A.W. Tozer)
The Pursuit of God: The Human Thirst for the Divine (A.W. Tozer)
A Bunch of Everlastings; Or, Texts That Made History (F.W. Boreham)
A Packet of Surprises: The Best Essays and Sermons of F. W. Boreham (F.W. Boreham)
The Screwtape Letters (C.S. Lewis)
The Last Sin Eater (Francine Rivers)
Mere Christianity (C.S. Lewis)
